messages.message: Started to do some testing on #1 :slightly_smiling_face: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1713520654623199

@Will Brown how large are the new business submission, or insurance policy being analysed against a repository of data? Do you have any samples? We can test against our underwriter guidelines chatbot as a workaround

The submission page length should be same as what we see at intact, axa etc. 

@Tom Murphy
Got it, do you have any examples? Wondering would a short single doc be sufficient for demos, or would we need to support multiple docs or larger lengths
Tom’s got a good one mocked up, that compares a broker presentation to the Underwriting Guidelines.
We’re about to show it to the AXIS Capital COO, will let you know how it lands
Awesome, if it's possible to record the call, it would be very useful signal. Else we could just debrief after. All the best!
went well- i can debrief now, else we can chat next week

Ultimately we’ll need to find a way to bring in context from a document repository as part of a Build field. Like how we used to call out to internal systems to validate extracted datapoints in the Deep Learning platform.

Can talk through next week from the AXIS Capital call, but really how to automate multi-step within a Build project. "I wouldn't expect an underwriter to prompt and wait for this response, surely this can be done in advance behind the scenes"
